title: What are they building in front of Food Lion at the corner of Carolina Beach Rd. and Golden Rd beside the charter school on the corner?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/what-are-they-building-in-front-of-food-lion-at-the-corner-of-carolina-beach-road-and-golden-road/
